long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disgraph is a tool that diagnoses and solves writing issues. A spell checker only detects and corrects orthographic mistakes, this tools detect and auto correct dyslexia and dysgraphia related mistakes, and diagnose you giving to you a treatment to revert your problem.This tools uses Google Prediction and Google BigQuery and learn from users.
